python_code:
@wp.kernel
def kernel_18(positions: wp.array(dtype=wp.vec3), velocities: wp.array(dtype=wp.vec3), forces: wp.array(dtype=wp.vec3)):
    tid = wp.tid()
    pos = positions[tid]
    vel = velocities[tid]
    
    dist = wp.length(pos)
    spring = wp.normalize(pos) * (-10.0 * dist)
    damping = vel * (-0.5)
    forces[tid] = spring + damping
